title: Priest who came under attack voices for peace
body_lines: It's a little over a week since the horrible experience that took place at the 'MainaGoGama' and 'Gotagogama' on May 9, the memories are still fresh.
Many things have happened since then. This is one of the photographs that went viral locally and globally.

While strongly denouncing all types of violence and hatred, a voice of lamentation and encouragement that will continue to strive to promote justice, peace,  reconciliation and unity among all brothers and sisters of this beautiful land.
